description.value:
Details Information on Imperial Guard weapons, supplies, and kits that are commonly utilised.

Requirements

HB: Can spend Full Action to Identify an Imperial Guard Weapon, Vehicle, or other issuable item. Once per game session, can add +5 to a Logistics Test.

Effect: Plentiful

Notes: -
